lead_paragraph: The owner of The Chicago Tribune and The Los Angeles Times, previously known as Tribune Publishing, did not mention Gannett’s takeover attempt.

headline.print_headline: Tronc Raises Guidance Despite Quarterly Drop
headline.main: Tronc Raises Guidance for Year Despite Second-Quarter Revenue Drop

snippet: The owner of The Chicago Tribune and The Los Angeles Times, previously known as Tribune Publishing, did not mention Gannett’s takeover attempt....
abstract: Tronc, previously known as Tribune Publishing, raises its guidance for 2016 into range of $1.61 billion to $1.63 billion; reports second-quarter profit of $4 million, up from $1 million in year-ago quarter; revenue was $52 million, up 7 percent from year-ago quarter.
